public FlagBox flagBox()
flagBox: Record flags for an edge. Usage example: if (edgeName.flagBox().getFlag(Edge.LOOP_BACK_EDGE)) ...; edgeName.flagBox().setFlag(Edge.LOOP_BACK_EDGE, true);
